meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7553.

td.p: Phil Ricciardi, a management consultant from North Wales, Pennsylvania
Becca Arm, a library worker from Herndon, Virginia
Tucker Dunn, an ESL teacher from Tucson, Arizona (whose 3-day cash winnings total $39,999)

tr.td: STYLES OF COUNTRY MUSIC
THE ARMED FORCES
DESIGN & ARCHITECTURE
CLASSIC CHILDREN'S BOOKS
ENDS IN "Y"
